thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: No FDA Seal of Approval for These Big Biotechs

author: Charley Grant
title: No FDA Seal of Approval for These Big Biotechs
text:
Investors got another reminder that profits at large biotech companies are fragile.
The Food and Drug Administration published a list of companies Thursday that it says employ “gaming tactics” to delay generic competition for branded drugs.
The FDA’s list of 52 drugs includes blockbuster treatments for serious diseases. High-profile examples... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
